```{r}

m <- matrix(m, nrow = 4, ncol = 4)

n <- rnorm(16, 90, 10)
n <- matrix(n, nrow = 4, ncol = 4)

birlestir <- cbind(m, n) #sutun bazÄ±nda
print(birlestir)
```
